original: **Map Status: No Stripper!**
zh_trans: **地图状态:No Stripper!

original: WARMUP
zh_trans: 热身回合

original: **Map Ported by Waffel. Thanks to NiceShot with helping.**
zh_trans: **地图移植 Waffel. 感谢 NiceShot 的帮助.(翻译:星荧铃,翻译有问题请论坛或社区Q群联系我)**

original: !! For better game experience, set your Graphical settings on High and Brightness 100% !!
zh_trans: !! 为了更好的游戏体验，请将游戏画面设置改为高，并将亮度调整为100% !!

original: **[Setzer] We have finally arrived. Welcome to Mt Bur-Omisace**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 前方就是神都·布尔奥米赛斯了**

original: **[Setzer] You have to go the rest of the way on your own. Flying closer is prohibited!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 剩下的路得自己走了，神都附近是严禁飞行的 **

original: **[Setzer] We meet soon after Ashe talk to Al-Cid Margrace of Rozarria!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 等到雅雪和亚尔习德·马古瑞斯交谈完后我们再碰面! **

original: **[Setzer] Good luck!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 一路顺风! **

original: **[Tonberry] Hello my friends! I sell and buy rare items! Take a look through my assortment**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利] 你好我的朋友! 我这里有些新奇的小玩意! 有兴趣来看看吗?**

original: **[Tonberry] I lost my Workshop Keys could you help we find them?**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利] 我靠？我丢了仓库的钥匙，您能帮我找找么?**

original: **[Tonberry] Thanks as a gratitude I'll give you a small gift when you next time give back all Keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利] 谢谢你! 作为答谢，下次你归还所有的钥匙后，我会给你一份小礼物 **

original: **Defend here for 25 seconds until the gates open**
zh_trans: ** 25 秒后门开 **

original: **A player has picked up Cure Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 治愈魔法 **

original: **[Bash] The temple was built here by believers**
zh_trans: **[巴修] 这座城市是由基迪亚教的信徒们所造 **

original: **[Bash] They did it to mark the place where the founder of the Light of Kiltia began to spread the teachings**
zh_trans: **[巴修] 用于纪念基迪亚教的创始人**

original: **[Bash] There are accounts of the holy city here dating back to writings from the age of the Galtean Alliance**
zh_trans: **[巴修] 这里记载了神都所有的历史，最早可追溯到加尔提亚联盟时代。**

original: **A player has picked up Sand Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了流沙魔法**

original: **The Gates of Temple will open in 35 seconds!**
zh_trans: ** 圣轮之门 35 秒后开启**

original: **A player has picked up Thunder Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 电魔法 **

original: **[Bash] Find the way to the Hall of The Light and talk with Gran Kiltias**
zh_trans: **[巴修] 找到前往光明之室的路，并与大僧正对话**

original: **[Bash] The gates are open. We have finally entered the temple**
zh_trans: **[巴修] 继续前进吧**

original: **A player has picked up Fear Magick**
zh_trans: ** 僵尸拾起了 恐惧魔法**

original: **Hold this area for 17 seconds!**
zh_trans: ** 守住这片区域 17 秒! **

original: **The gates will open in 20 seconds**
zh_trans: ** 大门 20 秒后开启**

original: **The gates will open in 15 seconds**
zh_trans: ** 大门 15 秒后开启**

original: **The gates will open in 10 seconds**
zh_trans: ** 大门 10 秒后开启**

original: **[Bash] Some of your items can damage the boss**
zh_trans: **[巴修] 部分神器可对boss造成伤害 **

original: **Nades do more damage**
zh_trans: **手雷能造成更多伤害**

original: **A player has picked up Aqua Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 水魔法 **

original: **A player has picked up Aero Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 风魔法**

original: **A player has picked up Damage Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 秒杀魔法**

original: **A player has picked up Dark Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 黑洞魔法 **

original: **A player has picked up Fire Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 火魔法 **

original: **The Behemoth has vanquished!**
zh_trans: **贝希摩斯已被击败！**

original: **[Bash] We shouldn't have come in here. Let's get out of here while we still can!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]我们怎么走到了这里，看来是走错路了，赶紧回去吧 ！**

original: **[Balthier] It's a dead end!**
zh_trans: **[巴弗雷亚] 这是个死胡同!**

original: **[Bash] Destroy the activation crystal or we'll all stay here forever**
zh_trans: **[巴修]摧毁水晶，否则我们会永远困在这里**

original: **[Bash] The crystal has been destroyed! It takes 15 seconds to fully activate!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]水晶已被摧毁！传送需要 15 秒来完全激活！**

original: **[Bash] Get to the fountain! Fast!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]快去喷泉那里！快点！**

original: **[Bash] The Guard of the gates. If we want to escape we have to defeat him!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]那是守卫。如果我们想逃离这里，就必须打败他！**

original: **[Bash] The Guard has vanquished! Keep runing!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]守卫已被消灭！继续走！**

original: **[Balthier] We have to hold this area for 20 seconds! Get ready!**
zh_trans: **[巴弗雷亚]我们必须坚守这个区域 20 秒！准备好！**

original: **[Balthier] Don't let them get to the balcony!**
zh_trans: **[巴弗雷亚]别让他们到达阳台！**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 6 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你需要再给我带 6 把钥匙来**

original: **Stage completed!**
zh_trans: **关卡完成!**

original: 已加载人类神器减速修改stripper
**[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 8 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你得再给我拿 8 把钥匙过来**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 9 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你需要再给我带 9 把钥匙过来**

original: **[Setzer] Dark clouds begin to gather over Temple Grounds. This is a bad sign**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚]神都的上空。。乌云密布。？是发生什么事了吗,,**

original: **[Setzer] Anyway find and talk with Gran Kiltias. Hope he acknowledge her as the rightful heir to the throne of Dalmasca!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚]不管怎样，去找大僧正谈谈。希望他承认雅雪是达尔玛斯卡王位的合法继承人！**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 5 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你需要再给我带 5 把钥匙来。**

original: **A player has picked up Limit Break Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已获得 极限突破（终极）**

original: **A player has picked up Poison Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已获得 毒魔法**

original: **A player has picked up Zombie Dark Magick**
zh_trans: **一名玩家已获得 僵尸黑洞魔法**

original: **Hold here for 28 seconds until the teleport is enabled!**
zh_trans: **在这里坚守 28 秒，直到传送开启！**

original: **[Vaan] Is that who I think it is!?**
zh_trans: **[梵]这个是什么玩意？！？**

original: **[Bash] Yes! It's the Sanctuary Keeper! The most dangerous guard! We must kill him before he kills us!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]圣殿守护者！？为什么它会在这里？不管了，先把它干了！**

original: **[Bash] Prepare for battle! Do not get close or you will die immediately!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]准备战斗！不要靠近它，否则我们会死！！**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Wind Rage!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者吹了一口气！（面朝场地中心按W抵抗推力）**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Carnage of Phantoms!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者刮起了一阵风！（按S抵抗吸力）**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Solar Orb!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者施展了火焰魔法！（躲避环形特效）**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Shadow Blast!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者施展了暗影冲击！（躲避脚底特效）**

original: **The Sanctuary Keeper has vanquished!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者已被击败！**

original: **[Bash] The last guard has vanquished! Now we can meet Gran Kiltias!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]干得好，它被打败了！现在我们该继续寻找大僧正了！**

original: **[Bash] Hurry and find a way to the lower parts of the Hall!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]快点找到通往大厅下层区域的路！**

original: **Hold here! Gates will open in 8 seconds!**
zh_trans: 在这里坚守！大门将在 8 秒后打开！

original: **[Bash] Well done! Hold this area for 40 seconds until the gates open!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]坚持住！守住这个区域 40 秒直到大门打开！**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 3 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你得再给我拿 3 把钥匙过来**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Annihilate!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者施展了毁灭术！**

original: **Get to the teleport to to avoid death!**
zh_trans: **快去传送点(中间的蓝色光球)不然要去世了！**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Interruption Seal!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者施展了中断封印！**

original: **Get out of the middle now!**
zh_trans: 远离场地中间特效！

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Flare of Freezing!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者施展了冰霜魔法！（躲避特效）**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Wave of Redemption!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者召唤了柱子！**

original: **Press all statues to interrupt the attack**
zh_trans: 对柱子按E ，打断攻击

original: **[Bash] stay focused! I have a feeling this isn't the end!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]保持专注！我有一种感觉，还没结束！**

original: **[Bash] It's the Adrammelech Shoot before it's too late!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]是愤怒的灵帝！快开火，把它打败！（BOSS方向来高低刀）**

original: **The Adrammelech has vanquished!**
zh_trans: **愤怒的灵帝已被击败！**

original: **[Bash] Don't let zombies cross the bridge! Its last hold defend until something happen!
zh_trans: **[巴修]别让僵尸过桥！这是最后的防线，守住，有什么事要发生了！**

original: **[Vaan] What's that!? Cactus...**
zh_trans: **[梵]那是什么！？仙人掌...**

original: **[Ashe] Not again... Shoot him because he will never leave us alone!**
zh_trans: **[雅雪]又来了... 开火，他不会放过我们的！**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 7 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你得再给我拿 7 把钥匙过来**
**地图更新时间:2025年02月07号**

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Mind Tempest!**
zh_trans: **圣殿守护者施展了闪电魔法！（别站在场地外圈）**

original: **YOU MUST TO KILL ALL THE ZOMBIES TO WIN**
zh_trans: **你必须杀死所有僵尸才能获胜**

original: **[Setzer] The temple is being attacked by the guardians!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 神都正受到帝国军队的攻击！**

original: **[Setzer] We hit! We hit! We have to fly! So far you're on your own! Good luck**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 我们被帝国军发现了！后面只能靠你自己了！祝你好运**

original: **[Bash] Look out! The Imperial Army is attacking!!**
zh_trans: **[巴修] 小心！帝国军正在进攻！！**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 1 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你得再给我拿 1 把钥匙过来**

original: **Defend here for 30 seconds until the gates open**
zh_trans: **在这里守 30 秒直到大门打开**

original: **[Bash] Kingdom and Empire both formed a pact to guarantee the holy city's independence
zh_trans: **[巴修]王国和帝国都达成了一项协议以保证神都的独立**

original: **[Bash] In its long history Mt Bur-Omisace has never fallen under the control of any foreign power**
zh_trans: **[巴修]在其漫长的历史中，神都布尔奥米赛斯从未落入过任何外国势力的控制之下*

original: **[Bash] On the understanding that Kiltia's followers would exempt themselves from political dealings in other lands**
zh_trans: **[巴修]条件是基迪亚的信徒们将自己免除在其他土地上的政治交易**

original: **The Gates of Temple will open soon!**
zh_trans: **圣轮之门很快就会打开！**

original: **[Balthier] Watch out! They are shooting us!**
zh_trans: **[巴弗雷亚]帝国的舰队正在瞄准我们！快躲开！**

original: **The way is open! Keep running!**
zh_trans: **圣轮之门被炸开了，继续跑！**

original: **The gates will open in 30 seconds**
zh_trans: **大门将在 30 秒后打开**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Soul Siphon!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长召唤了陨石(Soul Siphon)，快看头上！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Dedication Aura!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长使用了反伤魔法(Dedication Aura)！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Flash of Shattering!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长给自己武器附魔了(Flash of Shattering)！**

original: **All Bergan attacks do double damage!**
zh_trans: **贝甘的所有攻击造成双倍伤害！**

original: **Judge Bergan has cased Flash of Burning Souls!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了火焰魔法(Flash of Burning Souls)，远离场地中间火焰！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted 1000 Needles!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了千针刺(1000 Needles)！**

original: **[Bash] Judge Bergan used Magicite! We have to kill him!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]贝甘审判长使用了人造破魔石！我们必须杀了他！**

original: **Judge Bergan summons Esper Ultima!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长召唤出了 [圣天使] 阿尔蒂玛(Ultima)，全体血量调整至100！**

original: **Judge Bergan summons Esper Shemhazai!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长召唤出了 [告密者]修米哈萨(Shemhazai)，全体点名，准备远离脚底特效！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Ceremony of the Nether!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判官施展了幽冥仪式(Ceremony of the Nether)！**

original: **[Bash] Juge Bergan has summoned Venat! Kill him before is too late**
zh_trans: **[巴修]贝甘审判长召唤出了维涅斯(Venat)！快开火**

original: **[Bash] Finally! Venat is dead! Now we can deal with Bergan!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]维涅斯被击败！现在我们可以对付贝甘了！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Illusion of Souls!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长给自己覆盖了减速魔法(Illusion of Souls)！**

original: **[Balthier] He set his very bones about with manufacted nethicite**
zh_trans: **[巴弗雷亚]他用人造破魔石强化了自己的身体**

original: **[Balthier] Anyway we need to get out of here! Imperial reinforcements incoming!**
zh_trans: **[巴弗雷亚]不管怎样，我们都要离开这里！帝国增援部队要来了！**

original: **[Bash] Remember trust no one!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]记住，不要相信任何人！**

original: **[Bash] The Imperial Army set fire to the temples!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]帝国军放火烧了神山！**

original: **[Vaan] We have to get out of here before the main gates collapses!**
zh_trans: **[梵]我们必须在大门倒塌之前离开这里！**

original: **[Bash] We do not know they set additional traps for us! Be vigilant! Hold here for 20 seconds!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]我们不知道帝国军是否为我们设下了更多陷阱！保持警惕！在这里坚守 20 秒！**

original: **[Bash] We need to hold this area for 15 seconds!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]我们需要守住这个区域 15 秒！**

original: **[Bash] The exit is right in front of us! Get ready for the final battle**
zh_trans: **[巴修]出口就在我们正前方！为最后的战斗做好准备**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 2 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你得再给我拿 2 把钥匙过来**

original: **A player has picked up Invisible Magick**
zh_trans: ** 僵尸拾起了 隐身魔法**

original: **[Bash] Adrammelech blocked the path! Shoot him before is too late!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]愤怒的灵帝挡住了道路！快开火！**

original: **[Bash] Adrammelech vanquished! Path is clear!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]愤怒的灵帝被击败了！道路畅通！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Frost Fury!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了冰霜之怒(Frost Fury)，全屏减速！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Gift of Plagues!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了瘟疫魔法(Gift of Plagues)，来中间！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Aura of Water!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了狂风魔法(Aura of Water)，不要被推下去了！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Frost Bolt!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了寒冰魔法(Frost Bolt)！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Blazing Surge!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判官使用了火铠(Blazing Surge)，快远离他！**

original: **Judge Bergan summons Esper Famfirt!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判官召唤了 [黑暗之云]法姆弗里特(Famfirt)，快抵抗推力！**

original: **[Bash] Imperial Army trying to block the temple!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]帝国军试图封锁神山！**

original: **[Vaan] Look! There is clean path! Keep running!**
zh_trans: **[梵]看！有一条畅通的路！继续跑！**

original: **[Setzer] Hold on! They blocking the path!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚]坚持住！他们在封锁道路！**

original: **[Setzer] Watch out! We clean them out!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚]我们得把他们解决掉！！**

original: **[Bash] Nades do more damage**
zh_trans: **[巴修]手雷能造成更多伤害**

original: [Bash] Judge is dead! Keep running!!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]审判长死了！快跑！！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Rage of Magic!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长召唤了雷电(Rage of Magic)下一个技能生效时，会劈向道路中间的玩家！**

original: **Judge Bergan summons Esper Zodiark!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长召唤出了 [戒律王] 佐迪亚克(Zodiark)，快远离脚下的圈！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Moon Blast!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了月光魔法(Moon Blast)！**

original: **[Bash] You can't do any harm to Judge Bergan until you destroy the moonlight!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]在摧毁月亮之前，你无法对贝甘审判长造成任何伤害！**

original: **Judge Bergan is going to throw his blade! Do not stay together!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长要扔出他的刀了！不要待在一起！**

original: **[Bash] Well done! You interrupted the attack and now you may attack Judge Berga**
zh_trans: **[巴修]干得好！你打断了这次攻击，现在可以攻击贝甘审判长了**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Tranquility Wave!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长召唤了一阵水气(Tranquility Wave)，按s抵抗！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Severance of the Arcane!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长释放了终极(Severance of the Arcane)！**

original: **[Bash] Don't stay on sides! Get to the middle now!**
zh_trans: **[巴修]快去中间！**

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Wind Salvo!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长施展了风铠(Wind Salvo)！**

original: **Judge Bergan summons Esper Chaos!**
zh_trans: **贝甘审判长召唤了 [轮回王] 卡奥斯(Chaos)，它会对一名玩家召唤闪电！**

original: **[Tonberry] Thanks for your help now I can go back to my own**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]感谢你的帮助，现在我可以回去了**

original: **[Tonberry] Congratulations! There is your reward!**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]对了，这是给你的小礼物！**

original: **A player has picked up The Devileye**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 双手弩 **

original: **A player has picked up Judge Zargabaath**
zh_trans: **[裁判长]扎尔伽巴斯加入了战斗**

original: **Level has been changed on Ultimate Mode**
zh_trans: **关卡被变更为 终极模式**

original: **A player has picked up Crystal Shield**
zh_trans: ** 玩家已获得水晶盾墙**

original: **A player has picked up Ultimate Blade**
zh_trans: ** 玩家已获得 霸王之剑 (ammo)**

original: **[Tonberry] Still havent found all keys? You need to bring me 4 more keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利]还没找到所有钥匙吗？你得再给我拿 4 把钥匙过来**

original: **Level has been changed on Legend Mode**
zh_trans: 跳转至legend模式

original: **The airship will take us to the Sky Fortress Bahamut in 35 seconds**
zh_trans: <光辉号>将在35秒后把我们带入空中要塞 巴哈姆特

original: **[Bash] We must hurry before they destroy the whole temple!**
zh_trans: [巴修]我们必须马上去，阻止他们毁了整个神都

original: **[Balthier] Get on board. If we don't fly immediately they'll shoot us down!**
zh_trans: [巴弗雷亚] 快走，飞空艇就要起飞了！等下帝国舰队的炮火就要轰到我们头顶了！

original: **[Bash] We finally made it! Welcome to the Sky Fortress Bahamut!**
zh_trans: [巴修]我们成功偷渡到巴哈姆特要塞内了！

original: **[Bash] The goal is clear - destroy the airship and defeat Judge Gabranth!**
zh_trans: --->主要任务 找到并且击败裁判长伽布拉斯，摧毁这座帝国要塞！

original: **Antechamber will open in 35 seconds**
zh_trans: **前门将在35秒后打开**

original: **[Vossler York Azelas] Wait. A word of caution before we set out!**
zh_trans: --->这里是帝国最大的要塞

original: **[Vossler York Azelas] See that blurred gates**
zh_trans: --->注意看前面那个门

original: **[Vossler York Azelas] It is a mechanism to detect intruders within the ship**
zh_trans: --->那里面有帝国用来探测入侵者的装置

original: **[Vossler York Azelas] The alarm should cease after a time! But it's better to avoid drawing unnecessary attention!**
zh_trans: --->最好避免一些不必要的麻烦

original: **[Vossler York Azelas] Break one of these beams and an alarm will sound summoning the guard**
zh_trans: --->触发装置后，警报就会响起，要塞内的帝国军队会变得警惕

original: **The gates will open in 25 seconds!**
zh_trans: **大门25秒后打开**

original: **[Bash] To be sure that the Sky Fortress will blow up we have to block the power supply from the three engines**
zh_trans: [巴修]我们必须切断要塞内三台发动机的电源，以确保这个庞然大物能够停止工作

original: **[Bash] There should be a control panel next to each of them! Turn off the engines and run away as fast as possible!**
zh_trans: [巴修]发动机旁边应该有一个控制面板，关闭发动机后马上撤离！

original: **[SECURITY ALERT] Engine 01 has been stopped manually!**
zh_trans: -->安全警报<-- 第一台发动机已断电

original: **Catwalk Gate will open in 20 seconds**
zh_trans: 门将在20秒后打开

original: **[Bash] Defeat Gabrath before reinforcements come!**
zh_trans: [巴修]他们的援军就要来了，快击败伽布拉斯！

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Melt Skulls!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯使用了激光射线，不要站在他前面！

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Mateus!**
zh_trans: **伽布拉斯召唤了 [背德皇帝] 玛提乌斯 **

original: **A player has picked up Cortahombres**
zh_trans: 玩家获得了 大剑(正面生成直线减速区域)

original: **A player has picked up Dragon Whisker**
zh_trans: 玩家获得了 龙息(射出一个火球)

original: **A player has picked up Empyrean Rod**
zh_trans: 玩家获得了 天空法杖(免抓)

original: **A player has picked up Ensanguined Shield**
zh_trans: 玩家获得了血染之盾

original: **A player has picked up Judge Drace**
zh_trans: [裁判长] 多蕾斯加入了战斗

original: **A player has picked up Loxley Bow**
zh_trans: 玩家获得了洛克斯利之弓(正面生成圆形减速区域)

original: **Admin set Maximum Tenberry quest**
zh_trans: 管理员强行完成了冬贝利的任务需求

original: **Buttons in the admin room have been unlocked!**
zh_trans: 调关房按钮已解锁

original: **Judge Bergan has casted Spell of Demon Fire!**
zh_trans: 贝甘审判长使用了火焰魔法

original: **Judge Bergan summons Esper Adrammelech!**
zh_trans: 贝甘审判长召唤了[愤怒の灵帝] 亚德拉梅利特，远离脚底特效！

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Armageddon!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯使用了holy魔法，快贴护栏！

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Barrier of Voidness!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了冰精元素

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Cruel Paralysis!**
zh_trans: 远离伽布拉斯的行径路线！

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Ferocity of Darkness!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯使用了致盲魔法

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Frost Bolt!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯使用了冰霜魔法

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Fury of Courage!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯使用了勇气之心，靠近他会被减速！

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Past Heroism!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯治疗了自己

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Shadow Assault!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯隐身了！

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Spell of Sustenance!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯使用了流沙魔法

original: **Judge Gabranth has casted Voidness Bolt!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了紫色闪电，快远离脚底特效！

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Adrammelech!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了[愤怒の灵帝] 亚德拉梅利特，远离脚底的特效！

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Belias!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了[魔人] 贝利亚斯，小心头顶火球！

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Chaos!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了[轮回王] 卡奥斯，快来中间抵抗狂风！（周围的护栏会被吹烂）

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Exodus!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了[审判灵树] 艾克斯迪斯，

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Ultima!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了[圣天使]阿尔蒂玛，全体血量调正至100。

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Zalera!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了[死之天使] 扎努埃拉，抵抗中间的吸力！

original: **Judge Gabranth summons Esper Zodiark!**
zh_trans: 伽布拉斯召唤了[戒律王] 佐迪亚克，快远离它的正面！

original: **Level has been changed on Hard Mode**
zh_trans: 调整至hard关卡

original: **Level has been changed on Normal Mode**
zh_trans: 调整至normal关卡

original: **Sanctuary Keeper has casted Hymn of Balance!**
zh_trans: 圣地守护者释放了平衡之歌(Hymn of Balance)

original: **You are too slow**
zh_trans: 太迟了！

original: **You have beaten Mt Bur Omisace! Congratulations! **
zh_trans: 你已征服神都布尔奥米赛斯，你已经是一个合格的神人了！

original: **[Balthier] Don't let the zombies get through the main gate! **
zh_trans: [巴弗雷亚]不要让僵尸出来，防守住！！

original: **[Balthier] We need to get to the engines on the left and right side**
zh_trans: [巴弗雷亚]得去左右两边关闭剩下的两台发动机！

original: **[Balthier] When all engines are stopped the exit gate will be automatically opened!**
zh_trans: [巴弗雷亚]当所有发动机停电后，出口会自动开启。

original: **[Bash] Behemoth has casted its final attack! Kill him quickly!**
zh_trans: [巴修]贝希摩斯准备发动最后的攻击了！快击败它！

original: **[Bash] Don't let zombies get to the boss fight platform!**
zh_trans: [巴修]不要让僵尸进来！

original: **[Bash] Gabranth is defeated - Escape!**
zh_trans: --->伽布拉斯已被击败，逃离并且炸毁空中要塞

original: **[Bash] It's last hold! Be ready to escape!**
zh_trans: [巴修]这里是最终的守点！准备撤退了！

original: **[Bash] Judge Bergan has casted his final attack! Kill him quickly!**
zh_trans: [巴修]裁判长贝甘准备发动最后的攻击了！快击败他！

original: **[Bash] Main engines are about to explode! Warning grab something!**
zh_trans: --->空中要塞的供电引擎就要爆炸了！准备好！

original: **[Bash] Main engines could explode at any moment don't stay here too long!**
zh_trans: [巴修]我们不能在这里停留太久，这里马上就要爆炸了！

original: **[Bash] The Imperial Army has blocked the entrance! We must defeat them before it is too late!**
zh_trans: [巴修]该死！我们被巡逻的帝国军队发现了，快击败他们！后面的行动得加快了。

original: **[Bash] The Sanctuary Keeper has casted its final attack! Kill him quickly!**
zh_trans: [巴修]圣地守护者要发动最后的攻击了！快击败它！

original: **[Bash] Well done! The Path is clear! RUN!**
zh_trans: [巴修] 路上的障碍清空了，快跑！

original: **[Gabranth] Ha Defend?! You!?**
**[SECURITY ALERT] All engines shut down! The main gate will open in 25 second!**
zh_trans: --->所有发动机已停止工作，撤退的道路将在25秒后开启！

original: **[SECURITY ALERT] Engine 02 has been stopped manually!**
zh_trans: --->2号发动机已停止工作

original: **[SECURITY ALERT] Engine 03 has been stopped manually!**
zh_trans: --->3号发动机已停止工作

original: **[Vaan] Judge Gabranth has casted his final attack! Kill him quickly!**
zh_trans: 快点击败他！他要发动最后的攻击了！

original: [Bash] Hurry up! Sanctuary Keeper power up his abilities!**
zh_trans: [巴修]圣地守护者正在强化它自己！
